name: Goblin
description: A small, green-skinned creature that loves to ambush travelers.

name: Troll
description: A giant, brutish creature that regenerates health slowly.

name: Skeleton Warrior
description: A reanimated warrior clad in rusted armor, wielding a jagged sword.

name: Fire Imp
description: A small, mischievous demon that controls fire and causes burns with its touch.

name: Mimic
description: A creature that disguises itself as a treasure chest to trick adventurers.

name: Stone Golem
description: A hulking creature made of stone, nearly impervious to physical attacks.

name: Vampire Bat
description: A large bat with vampiric tendencies, sucking the life force from its prey.

name: Wraith
description: A ghostly apparition that drains the life force from its victims.

name: Ogre
description: A massive, slow-moving creature that uses brute force to crush its enemies.

name: Chimera
description: A fearsome beast with the body of a lion, the head of a goat, and a snake for a tail. It can breathe fire and poison its prey.
